item.title: Linda Yaccarino, After Exiting Elon Musk’s X, Tapped as CEO of Digital Weight-Loss Drug Management Company eMed
item.description: Linda Yaccarino, less than a month after stepping down as CEO of Elon Musk’s X, has found her next gig. Yaccarino has been named CEO of Miami-based eMed Population Health, which calls itself &#8
